attributes.action: Instruct councils to ban the use of the 'Smart' car cctv parking system in favour of more socially acceptable solution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This latest idea to roam the streets almost 24/7 in an attempt to 'clean up' a borough's parking problem on a zero tolerance 'shoot and ask questions afterwards' basis is both very unfair,unrealistic,unpopular and rapidly causing public discontent.The system appears to have no control and is rapidly becoming another kind of cash cow.
